original_text: But I will not have to tell the Father that you are guilty. No, it is Moses who will do that. You think that Moses is the one who will show that you are right. But he is the one who will show that you are guilty.
korean_text: 내가 너희를 아버지께 고발할까 생각하지 말라 너희를 고발하는 이가 있으니 곧 너희가 바라는 자 모세니라

sentences.original_text: But I will not have to tell the Father
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 내가 아버지께 말씀드릴 필요는 없습니다

sentences.original_text: it is Moses who will do that
is the one who will show that you are right
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 옳다는 것을 보여줄 사람이라고 생각합니다

sentences.original_text: who will show that you are guilty
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 죄가 있다는 것을 보여줄 사람입니다
